answers.answer: I feel huge also and I can't wait to get back in the gym. All of this is worth it but omg! Ready for my little princess and my body back!!!!! Good luck!!!!!
I had gd with my last son and only gained 12 pounds. With my last son born five weeks early I gained 17 pounds.

question: I'm 38 weeks today and I lost my mucous plug Monday/Tuesday so hopefully that means I'm starting to dilate. I was having a lot of Braxton hicks on Monday. Let's see what my doctor says tomorrow. I was 50% effaced at my last appointment but no dilation (last week).On another note, the weight keeps piling on. I seriously look like a whale and it's not doing anything good for my self esteem... I thought it was supposed to taper off?? Why am I still gaining weight!!!! I'm seriously stressing over how in the world will I lose all this weight. I do not have gestational diabetes but I have sure gained weight as if I had it. This is so depressing...I'm just looking forward to the end of the pregnancy. I'll have my beautiful little one and I'll have my body back so I can get started on diet and exercise
title: I'm so ready- hoping my baby comes next week
